description: The `ballerinax/sap.s4hana.api_del_doc_with_credit_block` package offers APIs for seamless integration with the [Delivery Document with Credit Block API v1.0.0](https://api.sap.com/api/API_DEL_DOC_WITH_CREDIT_BLOCK/overview). The service contains entities for credit blocked delivery document and reject reason. Once the delivery document has been checked, released, or rejected, a success message containing the document number is sent in the response.
